page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: There is very little new housing in our area because planning permission is hard to get. The older houses and cottages are built with flint from the Chilterns. Some of them were owned by the University (some still are). The newer houses are made of brick. Most houses are privately owned except in Lewknor where Barley Close and Weston Road belong to the council. There are no flats or high rise buildings. We do have a castle, though, and two Ma ors (Pyrton House and The Manor, Lewknor), and eight farmhouses.
